Models¶

Query¶

class query.models.ArticleType(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store the names of article types that are available in the elasticsearch index.

The article types are part of the metadata of a query.

class query.models.DayStatistic(*args, **kwargs)¶

DayStatistic is used to generate timeline graphs. Data for the DayStatistic table is gathered with the ‘gatherstatistics’ management command.

class query.models.Distribution(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model that stores the names of distributions that are available in the elasticsearch index.

The distributions are part of the metadata of a query.

class query.models.Query(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store a user’s queries.

get_query_dict()¶

Return a JSON serializable representation of the query object, that contains all relevant data and metadata.

class query.models.StopWord(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store stopwords.

Stopwords can be stored for queries, or are applied to all queries of a user.

Services¶

Models used for measuring ElasticSearch performance in management commands.

class services.models.DocID(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a document id used to generate queries of certain sizes

This model is used to store document ids. The document ids are used to generate query sets of certain sizes. These query sets are used to test the performance of generating word cloud data using ES in multiple management commands.

class services.models.QueryTerm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store query terms used to generate random queries

See management commands gatherqueryterms and weighted_queries.
